ActCanada Consumer Product Safety Act
SubjectCribs, Cradles and Bassinets Regulations
PrecisCRIBS, CRADLES AND BASSINETS REGULATIONS in order to improve the protection of the health and safety of young children with regards to the use of cribs, cradles and bassinets, including a specific focus on preventing injuries related to traditional drop-side cribs, and to further align Canadaâ€™s safety requirements with those of the United States.
